key.name: compact-icon
key.summary: if true just icon on pannel
key.description: Display just the icon in top pannel (without 'NVPN')

key.name: colored-status
key.summary: if true icon colored in status bar when connected
key.description: Display color in the top status bar

key.name: cmd-get-options
key.default: "nordvpn settings | sed -e :a -e N -e '$!ba' -e 's/\\\\n/;/g' | sed -e 's/: /:/g' | sed -e 's/ //g' | sed -e 's/-//g' | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'"

key.name: cmd-get-groups-countries
key.default: "nordvpn groups | sed -E 's/[^A-Za-z0-9\\-_]+/,/g' | sed -E 's/^,//g'; nordvpn countries | sed -E 's/[^A-Za-z0-9\\-_]+/,/g' | sed -E 's/^,//g'"

key.name: version-check
key.summary: If true check installed Nordvpn CLI tools version against expect version
key.description: Should the 'nordvpn' command version be checked?

key.name: settings-change-reconnect
key.summary: If true, reconnects every time settings are changed within the extension

key.name: recent-capacity
key.summary: Set how many items to store within the 'recent connection' menu
key.description: How many items in the 'recent connections' menu

key.name: recent-distinguish-groups
key.summary: If true, the entries in the 'recent connections' menu will be discriminate on groups, if location is identical and a group is specified

key.name: target-display-mode
key.summary: How to display the connection targets (countries, groupsâ€¦)
key.description: 0: only available targets (display default if none available); 1: all, but discriminates by display; 2: default
